{{Description|Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.}}
'''Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Traveling Doctor]].

==Description==
Back when the traveling doctor roamed from place to place, her days were busy and she hurried between appointments.<br />Come sun or rain, nothing could keep her from her work.<br />This handkerchief not only protected her messy hair, it also served as a bandage.<br />It saw her through all her hardships and became her most loyal partner on her journey.
